definitions.definition: a living thing that grows in earth, in water, or on other plants, usually has a stem, leaves, roots, and flowers, and produces seeds:
to put a plant into the ground or into a container of soil so that it will grow:
examples: We planted trees and bushes in our new garden.

definitions.definition: If you plant a particular area, you put plants into the ground there:
examples: The plot was surrounded by a stone wall and planted with flowering trees.
